content: Can you provide a list of fruits starting with the letter 'P' in an excel table format?

Certainly! Below is a list of fruits starting with the letter 'P' in an Excel table format. You can copy this table into an Excel spreadsheet.

| **Fruit**       |
|-----------------|
| Papaya          |
| Passion Fruit   |
| Peach           |
| Pear            |
| Persimmon       |
| Pineapple       |
| Plum            |
| Pomegranate     |
| Pomelo          |
| Prickly Pear    |
| Plantain        |
| Pawpaw          |

You can create an Excel file and paste the above data into it to have a structured table of fruits starting with 'P'.
